createMiner

  • createMiner(minerAccountId: string, URL: string, signingPublicKey: string, privateKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:116

    Create miner. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#a71fd1099d86cf82f0c4a61f9a2d5803b

    Parameters

    • minerAccountId: string

      Id of account which will be miner.

    • URL: string

      URL to miner promotional web page.

    • signingPublicKey: string

      Public key used to signing mining operations.

    • privateKey: string

      Private key to sign transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

listMiners

  • listMiners(fromId: string, limit?: number): Promise<MinerNameIdPair[]>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:492

    List miners in DCore network. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/group___wallet_a_p_i___mining.html#gadd09ed33a90485888d6d885ddaa82fcd

    Parameters

    • fromId: string

      Miner id to start list from, in format '1.4.X'. Example '1.4.56', Use '0.0.0' to list from the beginning.

    • Default value limit: number = 100

      Size of result list. Default 100(Max)

    Returns Promise<MinerNameIdPair[]>

    List of MinerNameIdPair.

setVotingProxy

  • setVotingProxy(accountId: string, votingAccountId?: string, privateKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:439

    Account what is selected as proxy, his votes is taken as yours. Automatically vote for same miners as voting proxy account voted, with your balance. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#a9c571d810992f8a72142ace75e74eceb

    Parameters

    • accountId: string

      Account if in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • Default value votingAccountId: string = ""

      Id of account to be set as voting proxy, in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • privateKey: string

      Private used to sign transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

unvoteMiner

  • unvoteMiner(miner: string, account: string, privateKeyWif: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:144

    Remove your vote from selected miner.

    Parameters

    • miner: string

      Miner to un-vote, in format '1.4.X'. Example '1.4.5'.

    • account: string

      Account id to un-vote miner from, in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • privateKeyWif: string

      Private key to sign thr transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

unvoteMiners

  • unvoteMiners(miners: string[], account: string, privateKeyWif: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:156

    Remove your votes from multiple miners.

    Parameters

    • miners: string[]

      List of miners to un-vote, in format '1.4.X'. Example ['1.4.5', '1.4.6'].

    • account: string

      Account id to un-vote miner from, in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • privateKeyWif: string

      Private key to sign thr transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

  • updateMiner(minerId: string, minerAccountId: string, updateData: MinerUpdateData, privateKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:358

    Update info in miner account. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#a4d94757da6cc355932fa01a0302e9007

    Parameters

    • minerId: string

      Miner id in format '1.4.X'. Example '1.4.56'.

    • minerAccountId: string

      Account id of miner in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • updateData: MinerUpdateData

      Information to be changed in miner account.

    • privateKey: string

      Miner's private key to sign the transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

voteForMiners

  • voteForMiners(miners: string[], account: string, privateKeyWif: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:224

    Add votes to multiple miners. This method is also called on voteForMiner.

    Parameters

    • miners: string[]

      List of miners to vote for, in format '1.4.X'. Example ['1.4.5', '1.4.6'].

    • account: string

      Account id to vote miner for, in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • privateKeyWif: string

      Private key to sign thr transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

voteUnvoteMiners

  • voteUnvoteMiners(voteMiners: string[], unvoteMiners: string[], accountId: string, privateKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:277

    Bulk operation to vote and unvote miners in one operation. Use to avoid paying fee for multiple vote operation.

    Parameters

    • voteMiners: string[]

      List of miners to vote for, in format '1.4.X'. Example ['1.4.5', '1.4.6'].

    • unvoteMiners: string[]

      List of miners to un-vote, in format '1.4.X'. Example ['1.4.5', '1.4.6'].

    • accountId: string

      Id of account vote changes will be made to, in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • privateKey: string

      Private key to sign the transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

withdrawVesting

  • withdrawVesting(vestinBalanceId: string, ownerId: string, amount: number, assetId: string, privateKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/mining.ts:402

    Withdraw amount from vesting for account. NOTE: 24h after amount is vested https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#abb116624419b0f7142d725150561534a

    Parameters

    • vestinBalanceId: string

      Vesting balance id in format '1.9.X'. Example '1.9.345'.

    • ownerId: string

      Vesting balance owner account id in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • amount: number

      Amount of balance to be withdrawn.

    • assetId: string

      Asset id of amount to be withdrawn.

    • privateKey: string

      Owner's private key to sign the transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.
